descriptionHtml:
[center]
[font=Verdana][color=#6aa84f][size=3][i]Aranya is a Sanskrit name meaning green and bountiful forest...[/i][/size]
[size=3][i]In Tolkien's Elvish Language her name means "Free"...[/i][/size][/color][/font]


[size=3]Aranya is my character that I decided to make as a follower upon request.

The Standalone Versions do not require any other mods.

The "Original" Version (in old files):
This version does not have any meshes/textures,
for those who want to customize Aranya with different face/body mods.Â 

Also, you can marry her!

[b]Feel free to add your screenshots, I love seeing them! :)[/b]

[font=Arial][color=#93c47d][b]Location:[/b][/color][/font]
Aranya can be found at The Temple of Kynareth in Whiterun.

[color=#93c47d][b]My Other Mods:
[/b][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68419/?]Laurel Preset for Racemenu[/url]
[/size][/center][center][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52228/]Adriana Preset For RaceMenu and ECE[/url]

[color=#93c47d][b]Mods I Recommend:[/b][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037/?]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5727/?]LOTR Weapons Collection[/url]

[color=#93c47d][b]FAQ:[/b][/color][b][color=#f4f4f4]
[/color][/b]
[b][color=#f4f4f4]How do you make a follower mod?[/color][/b]
I recommend the following tutorial -
[url={url}]Creating Standalone NPCs by Natilde[/url]
This explains how to create standalone followers.
How to add custom hair, body textures, using Creation Kit and Nifskope.

[color=white][b]Will you make another follower mod?[/b][/color]
Yes, when I have the time, I will make another one.

[color=white][b]Will you add a custom voice?[/b][/color]
I don't have the resources or the equipment to make a custom voice properly.

[color=#93c47d][b]Installation:[/b][/color]
Use Nexus Mod Manager to install (recommended) or install manually.

[color=#93c47d][b]Uninstallation:[/b][/color]
Uninstall with Nexus Mod Manager.

[color=#93c47d][b]Permissions:[/b][/color]
I do NOT give permission to anyone uploading this mod to other sites anymore.

[color=#93c47d]Videos (Thank you!)

[youtube]xlxSJNwKtNg[/youtube]

[youtube]FX0Va9BY6us[/youtube]

[youtube]sYVvbLVzfRM[/youtube][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6540414/?tb=mods&pUp=1][img]http://i1330.photobucket.com/albums/w577/StephieRawx/stephierawxlogo_zps9224e9d9.png[/img][/url]

[color=#93c47d][b]Credits:[/b][/color]

nuska
[/size][/center]

Hair is no longer transparent
Added CBBE version
